title: Is it just me...
body: or does it feel more like you are playing Willump than you are Nunu. Nunu is the boy on his back, and he doesn't do anything. Willump is the one that bites the monsters, Willump is more believable chucking an iceball that size at someone than Nunu is, Willump is the one that saps the heat to Absolute Zero, Willump is the one that does the blood boil (arguably). If Nunu gets changed at all, it needs to be something that gives Nunu something to do other than just Willump

replies.body:
Every so often I'll make a not very serious pitch to someone on the skins team for a legendary Nunu skin called 'Willump'. It'd have a special spawn in animation where the Yeti reaches up, grabs Nunu and then consumes him. After that you'd play as the Yeti for the rest of the game doing all the normal things (yeti does all the work!), but with yeti roars instead of the kid's voice.

More seriously, yeah, we're with you the Nunu+Willump combination's a bit lacking for what feels like it should be a partnership. I don't know when we'll do substantial work on Nunu, he needs it, but he's not Urgot or Warwick tier in terms of need or potential improvement. Would expect whenever we do though that one of our core goals would be to make both the kid and the yeti active, interesting and distinct from each other.

My 1 question is,what sub-class does Nunu fall into?
Nunu falls into the Warden subclass of Tanks.

Yeah, we see Nunu as closest to a Warden, given his ability to lock someone down's strong, he controls space hard during his ult and his initiation's pretty weak. It's a softer classification though than many, Nunu's a bit of an unusual champ in many regards (which is all good).

Honestly, the best description I've heard for Nunu is this: Your goal is to make someone on the enemy team as useless as you are. Whether it's counterjungling their souls out, or going top and snowballing them to death, that's what nunu does. He's the "You don't get to play league of legends this game" champ.

>Your goal is to make someone on the enemy team as useless as you are

Then how is that useless?

Because in a straight out, fair fight, your impact on the fight is negligible. Even if you played good all game long. Your goal as Nunu is to put someone else in the enemy team in this same situation, and that puts your team ahead, because it's normal for Nunu (he has other strengths elsewhere, like objectives control, area denial, etc.), but it's not for the enemy.

As a serious Nunu player, I echo the sentiment that Nunu does not have the need, but I would disagree that he lacks the potential.

Absolute Zero is an amazingly cool skill, and you've already demonstrated all the interesting potential Consume can have when you have a spell in your kit that can provide intense map pressure but little in-combat power. 

I think Nunu's Consume should be made to have the true damage scale by level instead of rank (because right now it's just insane to have 1000 true damage every 10 seconds at level 9) but in exchange the power of his Consume buffs could increase by rank. And it would be an interesting way to either give Nunu more ganking pressure (he could max Ice Ball first since Consume's damage scales with level) or more unique map control (you could double down on Consume being an objective control master spell by giving the Consume buffs considerable control over objectives. Like % health damage against monsters, maybe a speed buff when moving towards large monsters that triples when moving towards epic monsters, and like a massive armor buff when in combat with monsters).

I see tons of potential in a Nunu rework. Though I definitely agree that Evelynn, Urgot, Galio, Irelia, Warwick and Akali all need one before him.
